EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for those who visited our booth at IFT 2007
EmailTemplate.name: IFT 2007 Thank You Orange
EmailTemplate.subject: Univar Provides Boost of Energy for R&D
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Univar at IFT 2007!
<!--
Thank you for stopping by our
booth at IFT 2007!
-->
Our goal is to create new ideas with the latest ingredients to help you with your product and R&D challenges.
We are offering our IFT attendees a first look at the latest tools in food ingredient selection. Please take a peek at these new tools.
If you are in need of any products or further information, click here to send us an email.
Fresh Ideas Univar Food Ingredients
Contact our Food Technical Expert at: 843.532.1441 <!-- Univar USA
Food Ingredients
Online Ordering -->
This email was sent from Univar USA Inc.
17425 NE Union Hill Rd., Redmond, WA 98052
